\subsection{Detailed Description}
Miscellaneous. 
\begin{DoxyCode}
\textcolor{preprocessor}{#import <\hyperlink{fa_2fa_8h}{fa/fa.h}>}

\textcolor{keywordtype}{int} main (\textcolor{keywordtype}{int} argc, \textcolor{keywordtype}{char} \textcolor{keyword}{const} *argv[])
\{
    fa\_fa\_initialize();

    ...

    fa\_fa\_terminate();
    \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} 0;
\}
\end{DoxyCode}

\hypertarget{group___fa_fa_ga061c945c3f013c84561593911b661a44}{\index{Fa@{Fa}!fa\-\_\-initialize@{fa\-\_\-initialize}}
\index{fa\-\_\-initialize@{fa\-\_\-initialize}!Fa@{Fa}}
\subsubsection[{fa\-\_\-initialize}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void fa\-\_\-initialize (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{group___fa_fa_ga061c945c3f013c84561593911b661a44}


Performs global initialization. 

This function must be called exactly once before any other function in the library. A call to fa\-\_\-fa\-\_\-terminate() will reset the global state so that fa\-\_\-fa\-\_\-initialize() may be called again and so on. \hypertarget{group___fa_fa_ga66c7af3a85045329f71966dfe40a5acf}{\index{Fa@{Fa}!fa\-\_\-terminate@{fa\-\_\-terminate}}
\index{fa\-\_\-terminate@{fa\-\_\-terminate}!Fa@{Fa}}
\subsubsection[{fa\-\_\-terminate}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void fa\-\_\-terminate (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{group___fa_fa_ga66c7af3a85045329f71966dfe40a5acf}


Performs global cleanup. 

This function may be used to reset the global state as per above. It is not necessary to call this function before the program finishes. \hypertarget{group___fa_fa_ga09490b15451aa64808537eb688aa4604}{\index{Fa@{Fa}!fa\-\_\-set\-\_\-log\-\_\-file@{fa\-\_\-set\-\_\-log\-\_\-file}}
